name: horizontalbrush
title: Horizontal Brush
description: GiottoJS supports horizontal brush for both canvas and svg charts
author: Luca Sbardella

name: zooming
title: Zooming
description: Zooming on SVG and Canvas with GiottoJS using d3js behavour zoom
author: Luca Sbardella

name: barchart
title: Simple Bar Chart
description: A simple bar chart on canvas or svg
author: Luca Sbardella

name: giottologo
title: GiottoJS Logo
description: GiottoJS logo created using nested pie charts. It uses the latest d3js pie layout features such as pad angles and curved corners. Both SVG and Canvas supported.
author: Luca Sbardella

name: wineproduction
title: 2011 World Wine Production
description: Illustrate several options when visualizing data with a pie chart using GiottoJS. Both canvas and svg are supported.
author: Luca Sbardella

name: linetypes
title: Lines and Symbols
description: A run-through of all the options available when plotting lines and points on a chart. It shows how to use d3js line and symbol for both SVG and CANVAS.
author: Luca Sbardella

name: trianglify
title: Trianglify
description: Use the Trianglify Javascript library to create background images with Delaunay triangulation
author: Luca Sbardella

name: simplechart
title: Simple Chart
description: A simple line and point plot of two separate series
author: Luca Sbardella

name: sunburst
title: Zoomable Sunburst Partition
description: Zoomable Sunburst Partition with labels and resizing. Only SVG supported for now
author: Luca Sbardella
